long_description: The REI Ultralite Crushable cap is flexible enough to cram in a small pocket so it's handy when you need it on backpacking trips and jogs. Polyester/spandex fabric blend dries quickly, wicking front lining helps move moisture off your brow. Mesh side panels allow lots of airflow to keep your head cool. Foam visor won't crease when you stuff the hat in a backpack or jacket pocket.
short_description: The REI Ultralite Crushable cap is flexible enough to cram in a small pocket so it's handy when you need it on backpacking trips and jogs.
